name: Safe
description: The subject is secure and poses no immediate threat. It can be freely accessed within designated areas.

name: Restricted
description: The subject requires controlled access and monitoring due to its potentially unpredictable behavior.

name: Supervised
description: The subject must be constantly monitored by trained personnel due to its potentially hazardous nature.

name: Isolated
description: The subject is kept isolated from other entities due to its hostile nature or unknown effects.

name: Maximum Security
description: The subject poses an extreme threat and requires extensive security measures to prevent escape or interaction.

name: Apex
description: The subject is highly dangerous and must be contained in a specially designed facility. Any contact must be authorized by top-level personnel.

name: Uncontainable
description: The subject is deemed uncontainable and poses an inherent risk to containment measures. Alternative methods are being explored to mitigate potential threats.
